I was at the British unveiling of this car at the NEC in 1984 and I remember then that motoring journalists were really underwhelmed with this car. The car was “too fat”, the round rear lights were gone and the door strakes horrible compared to the “bonkers” Countach. Testarossa was seen in Europe as “America only”. 

But with excellent 80s product placement in “Outrun” and “Miami Vice” time has been kind to the Testarossa and it has kind of grown into its design and is now seen as a classic Ferrari.
Wider than most peoples houses 😄 Beautiful machine though, my favourite design details are the side intakes 👌
